requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600K, AMD 1600X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770; AMD Radeon 6950 HD; AMD Vega 8 IGP (Intel IGP not supported); 4GB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 4100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum average sustained frame rate of 30fps or better achieved on hardware combinations in this min-spec range. Your experience may vary based on a variety of factors.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-5930K or AMD 3600X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or better; AMD Radeon 580 or better; 4GB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 4100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game runs well on most common gaming configurations within the past 5-6 years (GTX 980-era and beyond).
